DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial With Two Physical Therapy Protocols After Breast Cancer Surgery Immediate Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Patients recruit surgery scheduling . They undergo preoperative evaluation one week surgery average . Patients undergo new assessment 07 , 15 , 30 , 60 , 90 180 day surgery , period describe PO 07 , PO 15 , PO 30 , PO 60 , PO 90 PO 180 . All patient receive standard physiotherapy treatment woman undergo breast reconstruction Physical Therapy Sector Mastology Discipline Department Gynecology Federal University São Paulo . The protocol consist early exercise , limit 90° shoulder range motion ( ROM ) , start day surgery repeat 7 day surgery . After 15 day surgery , patient randomize two treatment protocol . However , existence different type reconstructive surgery , randomization perform two group : - Alloplastic group : patient undergo reconstruction tissue expander breast implant - Oncoplastic Group : patient undergo mammaplasty / contralateral symmetrization Computer random sequence use randomization , group randomize Group A Group B . - Subgroup A : Patients start perform exercise free shoulder ROM . Patients tell limit movement feel pain . - Subgroup B : Patient keep shoulder exercise limit 90° 30 day surgery . Shoulder range motion : The shoulder ROM assess goniometer flexion , extension , adduction , abduction , internal rotation external rotation . The movement perform actively .
